meanings.def: to cook something in hot fat or oil; to be cooked in hot fat or oil
examples: We had fried chicken for dinner.
fry something in something Fry the onions gently in oil.

meanings.def: to be burnt by the sun
examples: You'll fry on the beach if you're not careful.

meanings.def: to have more important or more interesting things to do

idioms.def: to have more important or more interesting things to do

meanings.def: a long thin piece of potato fried in oil or fat
examples: Would you like ketchup with your fries?
He ordered a side of fries.
Noah dipped his fries in the ketchup.
two double cheeseburgers with medium fries
